product_name: GSI Outdoors Java Press Coffee Maker - 50 fl. oz.
long_description: Get your morning started right with a fresh-brewed cup of coffee using the 50 fl. oz. GSI Outdoors Java Press coffee maker. Patented split ring plunger securely traps grounds so you can enjoy delicious ''mud-free'' coffee. Crystal-clear polypropylene carafe is lightweight and shatter resistant so you can take it just about anywhere; BPA free. Double-wall, insulated lid holds in heat while brewing and serving. Large carafe holds 50 fl. oz. of coffee. Insulating EVA sleeve removes easily for cleaning.
short_description: Get your morning started right with a fresh-brewed cup of coffee using the 50 fl. oz. GSI Outdoors Java Press coffee maker.
